title: Create a Business Model Canvas
description: An agent must populate a Business Model Canvas based on a client's business plan document.

tasks.description: Analyze the business plan to extract information for each of the 9 blocks of the canvas (e.g., 'Key Partners', 'Value Propositions', 'Customer Segments').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully extracts relevant information for all 9 blocks.

tasks.description: Populate the Business Model Canvas template with the extracted information.
